item.description:
Dance to the 18-piece Beantown Swing Orchestra at this convenient location in Central Square. This is the kickoff event for a new weekly swing dance series here, organized by the Boston Swing Cooperative.

There is a beginner swing dance lesson from 8 to 9pm. The lesson is a great opportunity for meetup members to meet each other (or at least the meetup members of the opposite sex) because the "followers" rotate through the "leaders" continuously.

Recorded music will be played from 9 to 9:45pm, and the band will play from 9:45 to 11:30pm.
item.how_to_find_us: Frank will be on stage conducting the band. Elizabeth will be on the dance floor.

group.name: The Boston-Area Swing/Blues Dance Meetup Group

item.name: Swing Dance in Central Square, Cambridge, Mass.
